Render¶

class game.render.Renderer(surface: pygame.Surface, bkg_rect: pygame.Rect, matr_shape: Tuple[int])¶

Class that renders given nonogram matrix.

Parameters

  • surface (pygame.Surface) – Where to render.

  • bkg_rect (pygame.Rect) – Rectangle, in which matrix will be inscribed.

  • matr_shape (Tuple[int]) – Shape of the nonogram matrix (including hints).

get_cell_rect(i: int, j: int) → pygame.Rect¶

Get rectangle for cell by its coordinates.

Parameters

  • i (int) – Row index.

  • j (int) – Columns index.

Return type

pygame.Rect

hide()¶

Make renderer inactive.

render(matr: numpy.ndarray) → None¶

Render matrix. If number is < 0, then it means:

  • -1 Black square

  • -2 X

  • -3 White square

Parameters

matr (np.ndarray) – Given matrix.

Return type

None

show()¶

Make renderer active.

PWN
